statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x + 3 , 2 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x + 3 , -5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 6 , -3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 5 , 16 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} + 38 \, x + 21\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
